import JobZImage from "../../../../common/jobz-img"; import SectionJobsSidebar1 from "../../sections/jobs/sidebar/section-jobs-sidebar1"; import SectionRecordsFilter from "../../sections/common/section-records-filter"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { publicUser } from "../../../../../globals/route-names"; import SectionPagination from "../../sections/common/section-pagination"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { loadScript } from "../../../../../globals/constants"; import axios from 'axios'; function EmployersGridPage() { const _filterConfig = { prefix: "Showing", type: "Result", total: "10", showRange: true, showingUpto: "8" } useEffect(()=>{ loadScript("js/custom.js") }) const [jobsData, setJobsData] = useState([]); // Fetch data from API on component mount useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8080/jobs/grouped') .then(response => { // Set the grouped job data to the state setJobsData(response.data); }) .catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching jobs:', error); }); }, []); return ( <>
